trends: There have been 7 other sightings in West Covina
There was one other sighting in West Covina on or around January 24th 2010
divs: Sighting Detailsmy brother called and told me to look outside that the orbs were back. he was telling me that there were about six. So we went outside and could not see in the direction because the sun was so bright. So we decided to drive to his house about ten minutes away. We arrived and they were still there once i saw it we took video and caught it on my camera. We managed to watch it as it faded away in the clouds. We had about six family members witness this. My family has seen these orbs alote in this month and finally got them on camera.
